sources.title: Double Exposure
sources.description: “Top-notch B-quickie” “Nice surprise” “Bright entertainment” “Pleasant little romantic comedy” (IMDB reviews quotes). A fast-paced, fast-talking romantic comedy with the emphasis on comedy, and a competent cast led by Chester Morris and Nancy Kelly. Good second-feature production values. IMDB rating 6.4. Directed by William Berke. Released in 1944. Complete print.

sources.title: Classic Thriller Movie English Subtitles
sources.description: English subtitles for classic thriller movies.

metadata.Plot: A photographer for a men's magazine is disturbed by a recurring dream he has that he is killing his models by various gruesome means. Then he discovers that his city is being terrorized by a slasher who is stalking and murdering women on the streets. He begins to suspect that he may actually be the killer.
metadata.Actors: Michael Callan, Joanna Pettet, James Stacy
